content: SF 10W-22 Cordless drill driver Cordless drill driver with higher torque which specializes in demanding applications in wood and other materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Drill drivers and screwdrivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Uncompromised cordless performance - drill and drive more per charge at consistently higher speed thanks to Nuron batteries and the brushless motor Built to last - full metal chuck, brushless motor, rubber bumpers and optimized cooling to better withstand intense use under tough jobsite conditions Advanced safety features - Active Torque Control (ATC) helps to prevent uncontrolled spinning of the drill bit sticks, and an LED work light in the base provides a clear view of your work area On the Nuron battery platform - cordless tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, energy-saving drill bits and a range of services to keep you more productive Applications Cutting recesses and through holes using hole saws up to 6â€ diameter ### TECHNICAL DATA: Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint): 841 in-lb (soft joint), 1062 in-lb (hard joint) No load RPM: gear 1: 330 rpm; gear 2: 560 rpm; gear 3: 1300 rpm; gear 4: 2230 rpm Dimensions (LxWxH): 9.4 x 2.6 x 8.7 in Technical Data | Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint) | 841 in-lb (soft joint), 1062 in-lb (hard joint) | No load RPM | gear 1: 330 rpm; gear 2: 560 rpm; gear 3: 1300 rpm; gear 4: 2230 rpm | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 9.4 x 2.6 x 8.7 in | Tool body weight | 4.1 lb ### ITEMS- 2335695 - Cordl. drill driver SF 10W-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 10W-22 03 Cordl. drill driver
